channel.title: Java.lang error when running server
channel.description:
[code=java5]java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "40 3847" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.loadDrops(NPCDrops.java:43) at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.<init>(NPCDrops.java:15) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:71) Loaded clipmap in 16ms. [10/2/15 2:06 PM]: Launching Dragonic-Scape... [10/2/15 2:06 PM]: Loaded clipmap in 19ms. [10/2/15 2:06 PM]: Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:43594 [10/2/15 2:08 PM]: [REGISTERED]: nate [10/2/15 2:12 PM]: Average Cycle Time: 0ms [10/2/15 2:12 PM]: Players online: 1, engine load: 0.0% [/code]
Dug around in those npc files and couldn't find any exact 3847 strings.. Any help is appreciated!

item.title: Java.lang error when running server
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The reason you didn’t find the numbers in those files is because it’s not in anything listed in your compiler.

The error is actually in your NPC drops file.

So probably one of the following:
NPCDrops.TSM
NPCDrops.cfg

Just search for the 3847.

You need to fix the line so it’s tabbed/spaced exactly like the other lines in the file.

Read full topic
